item.title: Exploring social network analysis for understanding terrorism ğŸ¦¹
item.author: nguyenmanhhung04051998@gmail.com (Nguyen Manh Hung)
item.description: What is social network analysis and how can it be applied to help us understand the structure and dynamics of terrorist networks? We’ll demystify the basics of centrality, community and show you how it can reveal the inner workings of terrorist groups. You can access an interactive Streamlit dashboard here: Link Terrorist and random network analysis This project examines terrorist social networks using data available from data information sources in Valdis Krebs’ article.

I have a Master’s degree in Data Science, Statistics and Econometrics and i have also a Bachelor in Mathematics and Applications at ğŸ« University of Rennes, France. I’m passionate about implementing data analysis, developing data visualization tools, and designing machine learning, deep learning algorithms. From May 2022 to Aug 2022, as a Data Scientist intern at WELOVEDATASCIENCE in Belgium, I embarked on a project to extract meaningful insights from ğŸ–¼ï¸ satellite imagery by implementing routines for downloading satellite tiles ğŸ›°ï¸ in the NIS9 geographical divisions.
